description:
In the first 24 hours of the launch of this course on 9/1/15, close to 500 hundred students enrolled!

Your daughter or someone your daughter knows will be sexually assaulted while in college.

Education can lower her risk.

According to the CDC, that is 1 in 5 young women. The economic cost of rape from fees stemming from medical and victim services, loss of productivity and decreased quality of life, range from $87,000 to $240,776 per rape. This course will equip your daughter with the awareness, tools, and knowledge she needs to be safer, smarter and successful in college. A minute gone by is another minute closer to the potential cesspool of dangers and distractions. These danger could destroy your baby girl on her very well deserved path to a life that she loves. Enroll your daughter in this course now and prepare her for college success.

You have a totally unconditional guarantee. Study the course. Try it out. If you are in any way unsatisfied you will get a full 100%, no questions asked, refund direct from Udemy.

See you in the course.

Thanks,

Lacey!
title: How to Stay Safe in College
